channel.title: United on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in United on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United 2-3: Premier League – as it happened
item.description: All the updates as United shock Arsenal with stunning second-half goals from Patrick Dorgu and ⁠Matheus Cunha.

item.title: Manchester United dent Arsenal’s title bid with dramatic 3-2 win
item.description: Matheus Cunha's superb late strike clinches a thrilling 3-2 away win for United against the Premier League leaders.

item.title: Canadian PM Carney fires back at Trump over claim that 'Canada lives because of the United States'
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney rejected President Donald Trump's claim that "Canada lives because of the United States," declaring Canada "thrives because we are Canadian."
